content: The Stone Essence is one of the more hidden Key Items in Black Myth: Wukong. It is dropped by a secret boss found in Fright Cliff and you will need it to help the Man-In-Stone within the same area.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Stone_Essence.md', within the main section titled 'Stone Essence'.
The content is as follows:
The Stone Essence is one of the more hidden Key Items in Black Myth: Wukong. It is dropped by a secret boss found in Fright Cliff and you will need it to help the Man-In-Stone within the same area.
